name: Platyparty!
description:
Platyparty! is a 1v1 or 2v2 local multiplayer team game. Collect blocks and bring them to your home base to get points, or steam them from your opponents! Push or drag the blocks, stun your enemies, do anything to score faster and keep your enemies from scoring!

The game is best played using gamepads! (tested mostly with Xbox 360 controllers).

A game by A3 Studios.

  • Aryel Tupinambá - Lead Programmer
  • Letícia Kido - Lead Sprite & Concept Artist
  • Alexandre Campos - Audio & SFX Designer

Guest team:

  • Victor Rodrigues - Assistant Programmer (UI)
  • Rafael Arnosti - Assistant Programmer (Animation)
  • Alexandre Ribeiro de Sá - Shader Programming
  • Gabi Millaneli - Additional Art (Title screen)
